did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Blatchford, E.W. Hog Raising and the Pork Packing Industry in America

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Scrapbook of correspondence, completed questionnaires, draft reports, and news clippings. Material relates to the investigation of the American pork industry by a special committee appointed by the President of the United States

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Blatchford, E.W. Hog Raising and the Pork Packing Industry in America, Crerar Ms 207, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook of correspondence, completed questionnaires, draft reports, and news clippings. Material relates to the investigation of the American pork industry by a special committee appointed by the President of the United States

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:
